Sure, here are some tips to improve your speaking skills in English:

1. Practice speaking regularly: Speaking regularly is one of the best ways to improve your speaking skills. You can practice speaking by talking to friends, family members, or even to yourself in English.
2. Listen to native speakers: Listening to native speakers will help you learn the correct pronunciation, intonation, and rhythm of the language. You can listen to English podcasts, watch English TV shows or movies, or even listen to English songs.
3. Learn new vocabulary: Building your vocabulary will help you express yourself more clearly and accurately. You can learn new words by reading books, articles, and news in English, or by using vocabulary apps.
4. Focus on grammar: Grammar is important for clear communication. You can improve your grammar by studying English grammar books or taking online grammar courses.
5. Practice with a language partner: Practicing with a language partner who is also learning English can be a fun and effective way to improve your speaking skills. You can find language partners through language exchange websites or apps.

Remember, improving your speaking skills in English takes time and practice. Be patient with yourself and keep practicing regularly. Good luck!
